abstract: Stocks rise slightly, buoyed by rising oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Energy Shares Close Up After Bumpy Day
headline.main: Energy Shares Gain on Lackluster Day for Market

snippet: Stocks swung between small gains and losses despite a jump in the price of crude and natural gas. Shares of banks and technology companies were down.
lead_paragraph: Stocks swung between small gains and losses despite a jump in the price of crude and natural gas. Shares of banks and technology companies were down.
